scripts.build:moment: ngc -p moment && java -jar node_modules/google-closure-compiler/compiler.jar --flagfile closure.base.conf node_modules/moment/moment.js node_modules/moment/package.json moment/externs.js --entry_point=moment/built/bootstrap --js_output_file=moment/built/bundle.js
scripts.build:ng-upgrade: rm -rf ng-upgrade/node_modules && ngc -p ng-upgrade && java -jar node_modules/google-closure-compiler/compiler.jar --flagfile closure.base.conf ng-upgrade/externs.js --entry_point=ng-upgrade/built/bootstrap --js_output_file=ng-upgrade/built/bundle.js
scripts.test: tsc -p tsconfig.tests.json && concurrently "yarn run serve" protractor --kill-others --success first
